title: Glen Canyon National Recreation Area: Hiking
body: Hiking        Find yourself in Glen Canyon. NPS Photo/Graffiti Removal & Intervention Team       Whether you're just looking for a quick walk, a day hike, or a multi-day backpack trip, Glen Canyon has something to offer.  The hikes listed here are only the beginning. If you are out camping on the shores of Lake Powell or anywhere in the backcountry you are welcome to explore the many side canyons, slickrock hills, and passageways through washes into slot canyons or hanging gardens. Just stay safe.      NOTE: There are no maintained trails in Glen Canyon National Recreation Area. All trails listed here are suggested walks. Hike at your own caution.
